amendment.description: To limit the use of funds to implement the Arms Trade Treaty.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3809 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3809 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5901; text: CR S5901) To limit the use of funds to implement the Arms Trade Treaty.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3809 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3809 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
